title: v0.0.5 - Tile Mapping News
author: Millwr1ght
content:
• "Made a tilemap of game elements"
  • "Started the game loop"
  • "Added this page to the site!"

title: v0.1 - My machine works! It really works!
author: Millwr1ght
content:
• "All the basic functions of Wanderer work now! Movement, tile collisions, even autosave!"
  • "Never have to start over again"
  • ::marker "Fixed some broken links, so now you can really access this page of the site!"
